main event: A report detailing a UFO sighting over Shafter, California on July 3, 1956, noted that the object appeared to be floating above and disappearing.
interesting points: The observation was categorized as a ground visual encounter., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object was noted to drift slightly left and right before fading., There was speculation that it might have been a balloon., The report is part of the Project Blue Book records.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object that appeared to float and then disappear
witness description: GCC observer at GCC post in Shafter, California
